_header: O of Jesse thou holy root
_description: Song ‘0 radix Iesse’ — three quatrains and 8-line Latin burden: ‘O radix iesse supplices / Te nos inuocamus / Veni vt nos liberes / Quem iam expectamus’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
O of iesse thow holy roteThat to thi pepill arte syker
                    merke…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…In the rotedde what we showeAnd graunte ows blisse after owre
                    decesse
